==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Frost Cannon:''' Sprays frost from their cannon in an arc in front of them, continuously dealing '''30% ATK''' as  {{Color|Cryo DMG}}.
**'''Enhanced:''' While their '''Cryo Armor''' is active, the Cryogunner Legionnaire will walk slowly towards the target while continuously spraying for a greatly extended duration.
*'''Leap:''' Leaps into the air and smashes down at the player's location, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Cryo DMG}}.
*'''Ram:''' If the player strays too near, rams the player with their belly, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used when the '''Cryo Armor''' is inactive.
*'''Frozen Armor:''' Upon reaching '''50%''' HP or after some time has passed, generates a {{Color|Cryo|[[Frozen#Frozen Element|Frozen]]}} [[Shields|shield]], granting them a massive increase in [[Resistance]]s and enhancing their '''Frost Cannon''' attack. The shield is weakest to {{Color|Pyro}}. Breaking the shield will leave them stunned and vulnerable to attack. Unlike most Frozen shields, this [[Poise Damage]] cannot damage this shield.
